name: Fast Food Cook
description:
This game and all the assets used in the game, was made entirely for Epic MegaJam 2022. 

The connection with the theme : AS ABOVE SO BELOW
The goal is to reproduce the order, from the screen ABOVE, on the table BELOW. 
Did you get the idea? From ABOVE to BELOW ? 

In this game, you are a cook in a Fast Food Restaurant, and you make pizzas.
